thread.title: Bernie Sanders Reacts To Larry David’s SNL Impersonation

author: wn.com
title: Bernie Sanders Reacts To Larry David’s SNL Impersonation
text: Senator Bernie Sanders (I-Vt) has been a revelation among young Americans in the Democratic primaries so far, and the self-described democratic socialist enjoyed the much talked about Larry David’s impersonation on Saturday Night Live. In fact, Sanders loved it so much he has invited the comedian to join him on his campaign trail. “I think...
